#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i< (b);i++)
#define input(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define CLEAR(a) memset((a),0,sizeof(a))
#define INF 1000000000
#define LL long long
#define PI 2*acos(0.0)
#define sqr(a) (a)*(a)

LL dp[21];
int n;
inline void preprocess()
{
   dp[2]=1;
   dp[3]=2;
   FOR(i,4,21)
   {
      dp[i]=(i-1)*(dp[i-1]+dp[i-2]);        
   }  
}
int main()
{
    preprocess();
    int tc;
    input(tc);
    while(tc--)
    {
        input(n); 
        //cout<<dp[n]<<endl;  
        printf("%lld\n",dp[n]);    
    }
    //getch();
    return 0;
}
